colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011B (CES CHOS SKYONG DREGS PA LCAM DRAL GYI THUGS RTEN 'DZUGS PA'I CHO GA DAM CAN DGYES PA'I ROL MTSO LAS BZHI LHUN 'GRUB CES BYA BA 'DI NI AER TE NI NOM CHI THO YON BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS RAB BRTAN GYIS BSKUL BA'I NGO MA CHOG PAR, BYANG PHYOGS MTHA' KHOB SOG YUL GYI MTHAR SKYES PA, 'JAM DBYANGS DNGOS GRUB RGYA MTSO ZHES PA DANG, MING GZHAN PADMA DBANG CHEN GYI RNAL 'BYOR PA RLOM PA, KHYAD PAR DU CHOS SKYONG 'DI NYID LA MI PHYED PA'I DAD PA THOB PA'I SNGAGS SMYON DPAL CHEN DRAG PO RTZAL GYIS, ,^ BLA MA GONG MA RNAMS KYI GSUNG RGYUN LA GZHIR BYAS NAS, ,RAB BRTAN CHOS 'KHOR GLING DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BSKUL BA PO NYID BGYIS PA SIDDHA YANTU,, ,,)
